scripts.build:base: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run compile-build-tools" "npm run compile-client" && concurrently "npm run copy-assets" "npm run compile-styles" && npm run css-minify
scripts.build:local: npm run build:base && cross-env environment=local npm run render
scripts.build:staging: npm run build:base && cross-env environment=staging npm run render
scripts.build:production: npm run build:base && cross-env environment=production npm run render
scripts.compile-styles: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 styles/styles.scss built/styles/styles.css
scripts.copy-assets: cross-env-shell shx mkdir -p built/assets/ && concurrently "cross-env-shell shx cp -r assets/ built/" "cross-env-shell shx cp -r styles/ built/" "cross-env-shell shx cp ads.txt built/"
scripts.watch: npm run build:local && concurrently "npm run serve" "npm run watch-styles" "npm run watch-build-tools" "npm run watch-client" "npm run watch-ejs" "npm run watch-view-data"
scripts.watch-client: nodemon --watch scripts/ --ext ts --exec "npm run compile-client && cross-env environment=local npm run render"
scripts.watch-ejs: nodemon --watch views/ --ext ejs --exec "cross-env environment=local npm run render"
scripts.watch-styles: nodemon --watch styles/ --ext scss --exec "npm run compile-styles && npm run css-minify"
scripts.watch-view-data: nodemon --watch viewData/ --ext json --exec "cross-env environment=local npm run render"
